7in-4S/6S-2806-1300/1700kv-Skylion-frees.preset_note: 7in Glide. Base tune not meant to be perfect Mainly for 7in, but tested on 6in 4s and 7in 4&6S
7in-4S/6S-2806-1300/1700kv-Skylion-frees.__comment: !!! Filters Gyro !!! type: 0=PT1, 1=BiQuad; ON for nonHelio, OFF for Helio

6in-6S-2207-1900kV-nerdCopter-freestyle.preset_note: This is a starting-point for Helio/Strix tuning.  Use BlackBox Log analysis to tune your quad-specific LPF's (gyro and kD).  Raise kP's as needed then balance kD's as needed. Finish up with kI's. Use motor_output_limit as needed. IMUF version of your choice. I prefer sharpness=0; however, not all versions allow such.  Also sharpness=1 may not produce the expected results, so I chose a small value for this preset. Feel free to experiment with kD LPF type PT1; I chose BiQuad for general safety in regards to motor temperature and kD tolerance. Matrix ON, only to be more widely compatible. I prefer Matrix OFF and a single kD LPF if the quad tolerates it.
6in-6S-2207-1900kV-nerdCopter-freestyle.build_frame: 5 inch & 6 inch, if you tune it.
6in-6S-2207-1900kV-nerdCopter-freestyle.build_props: 5 inch & 6 inch, if you tune each.

5in-6S-2207-1800kv-GrecsWhirlybird-frees.preset_note: 5-inch Slatra frame; Should work with any true-X 403g weight w/o batt & GP.  Only tested with 6S, but 4S should work as well.  These IMUF LPF are configured for IMUF250. Revert to lower defaults or tune them for older IMUF versions. Matrix ON with Q 400, Min 100.
5in-6S-2207-1800kv-GrecsWhirlybird-frees.__comment: !!! Filters Gyro !!! type: 0=PT1, 1=BiQuad; ON for nonHelio, OFF for Helio

5in-6S-2207-1750kV-Andrey-freestyle.preset_note:
Tune suitable for powerfull 6S motors with lightweight props.
Should be run with 32khz OFF and 4k/4k Gyro and PID loop

5in-4S-2207-2750kV-BlackBird & Shlangy-s.preset_note: Should be run with 32khz ON and 32k/16k Gyro and PID loop

5in-4S-2207-2750kv-Filthrillz Stella.preset_note: Good for 5in Freestyle quads for 4s only

5in-4S-2305-2550kv-V2-Pierre-Meunier-Smo.preset_note: Preset smooth PID for 4S 5inch Freestyle quad, it should be compatible with most setup with strong motors

5in-4S/6S-2306-2450/1800kv-Skylion-Cinem.preset_note: Softer 5in tune for cinematic/6s freestyle. Based on my main 5in settings tested on FPVCycle cineglide and I had a friend test 6S for me
5in-4S/6S-2306-2450/1800kv-Skylion-Cinem.__comment: !!! Filters Gyro !!! type: 0=PT1, 1=BiQuad; ON for nonHelio, OFF for Helio

5in-4S-2306-2450kv-Skylion-freestyle.preset_note: My Main 5in 32khz tune. Exactly my main 5in aliens settings, only difference is I left the gyro/dterm lpfs alone, on Helio/Strixf10 you can turn them off if your build is clean enough
5in-4S-2306-2450kv-Skylion-freestyle.build_frame: Impulse RC Alien, FPVCycle deadcat glide lite
5in-4S-2306-2450kv-Skylion-freestyle.__comment: !!! Filters Gyro !!! type: 0=PT1, 1=BiQuad; ON for nonHelio, OFF for Helio

3in-3S-1303-5000kv-Skylion-Freestyle.preset_note: Good for 3inand 4in toothpick or ultralight 3s quads

2.5in-2S-1103-8022kv-Skylion-Freestyle.preset_note: Good for 40mm powerwhoop to 3in toothpick running 2s micros

1.5in-1S-0803-19000kv-Skylion-Freestyle.preset_note: Good for ducted 65mm or 75mm 1s whoops or tinyhawk

Default-with-low-dTermLPFs.preset_note: This preset has lower dTerm LPFs, with LPF1 at 65 and LPF2 at 200. Possibly over-filtered, but should be safer for motor heat. Be aware that both over-filtering or under-filtering (Gyro and dTerm) can lead to motor heat.

Default-with-high-dTermLPFs.preset_note: This default has higher dTerm LPFs, with LPF1 at 100 and LPF2 at 250.  Please be cautious of motor heat.  Both over-filtering or under-filtering (Gyro and dTerm) can lead to motor heat.
